Notes: 90% Collection available on catalogue (KEMU) http://www.mhs.ox.ac.uk/collections/imu-search-page/, mainly archives and rare books that have not been catalogued. CM: their online catalogue clearly says 'about 20,000 records' so there is some discrepancy with the numbers here.
